fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, sell Crystal to a player, with effects identical to the below item. They may use it at any time if they wish. Gain 3 Profit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not sell to the same player twice.
- Selling to Guild members instead causes you to lose 3 Profit.
Item: Crystal
- Cost 4
- Uses 1
- Smoke: Enter a frenzy, gaining powerful defense and rampaging at your house for the next two nights and cleaning victims. You canâ€™t perform any abilities during this.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)
